events.text: finally! it’s about time you showed up, [PlayerName]. we’ve been stuck here way too long.
you remember my life, right? best life you’ve ever lived, i bet!
roaming through the forest, catching mice, snoozing in the sun…happy days!
well, till the end there. no matter how much we cleaned, that scratch just wouldn’t heal, would it?
at least i’m not feeling it now!
…if we’d asked for help, maybe we could’ve lived through that. too bad!
it’s something to know for the future, though, right?
alright, let’s get on with it.
